diagnostic_insight.zh: 澤上有風，感應無礙。你的氣場呈現出一種『誠信』與『通透』的特質。你的內心是空的（虛懷），所以能容納真實。這是一種強大的感召力，能夠跨越障礙，甚至感化頑固之物（信及豚魚）。
diagnostic_insight.en: Wind over Lake; unimpeded resonance. Your energy field presents qualities of 'integrity' and 'transparency'. Your heart is empty (humble), so it can contain truth. This is a powerful charisma capable of crossing obstacles and even influencing stubborn things (trust reaching pigs and fish).

action_guidance.zh: 誠信為本，直覺導航。在這個時刻，邏輯與策略都不如『真心』有效。相信你的直覺，發出你真實的聲音。任何的欺瞞或掩飾都會象徵上被識破並破壞氣場。保持內在的信實，你將能平安渡過大河。
action_guidance.en: Integrity as the foundation; intuition as navigation. At this moment, logic and strategy are less effective than a 'true heart'. Trust your intuition and voice your truth. Any deceit or cover-up will be instantly detected and destroy the energy field. Maintain inner faithfulness, and you will safely cross the great river.

primary.en: Trust reaching even pigs and fish; sincerity splits metal and stone.

secondary.en: Two boats sailing side by side, aided by the wind.

contraindications: 忌虛偽欺騙 (Avoid hypocrisy and deceit)
忌輕諾寡信 (Avoid making light promises)
